title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Current Plans and Projects
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Current Plans and Projects              Current Plans and Projects       Land Use Planning   Final Ocean Beach Fire Program Alcatraz Ferry Embarkation  General Management Plan Update for Point Reyes National Seashore & Northern Golden Gate National Recreation Area  Request for Proposals to Lease Historic Equestrian Stables in Marin County Dog Management Planning  Restoration and Trail Plans   Redwood Creek Trail Realignment & Dias Ridge Trail Extension EA/IS*   Trails Forever Program   Fort Barry Rifle Range Restoration   Fort Baker 300-Yard Rifle Range Restoration    Buildings, Infrastructure, and Transportation  Muir Woods Reservation Environmental Assessment  Headlands Institute Improvements and Expansion Plan Sausalito-Marin City Sanitary District Treatment Plant Upgrade Doyle Drive - South Access to the Golden Gate Bridge Fort Funston Site Improvements Fort Barry Firing Range Complex Administrative Record Available for Public Review   Project Review and Development Monitoring  Project Review is an ongoing program by which GGNRA reviews and approves many other projects that can be categorically excluded from NEPA compliance. Planning staff also review proposals from other agencies and municipalities within or adjacent to the park (i.e., Caltrans, PG&E, city planning agencies). * Open for public comment
